short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the network status of a portable WiFi HotSpot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays the signal strength and connection type of WiFi HotSpot devices.  It also displays a small red battery symbol when the device's battery is low.

Currently it only supports the Verizon Jetpackâ„¢ device manufactured by Novatel Wireless (MiFi 5510L).  This devices exposes connection information via http://my.jetpack/srv/status.
